Name: Landmarks, Constellation CB16, Brooklyn (C 250314 HAK)
Title: Application number C 250314 HAK (Constellation CB16) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law of New York State for the designation of an Urban Development Action Area and an Urban Development Action Area Project, and pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, for property located at 1794-1796 St. Johns Place (Block 1474, Lots 29 and 30), 85-87 Legion Street (Block 3514, Lots 6 and 7), and 250-254 Herzl Street (Block 3555, Lots 45 and 46), Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 16, Council District 41.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
